sentences.en: After the dispatch of the messenger we waited.
sentences.cn: 派出使者后,我们等待着.

sentences.en: But I am in a great hurry, man, to take that dispatch.
sentences.cn: 不过,我很着急呢, 伙计, 得送那份急件.

sentences.en: Give the seller in time the necessary instructions for dispatch.
sentences.cn: 及时给与卖方必要的发货指示.

sentences.en: Goods are normally dispatched within 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 货物一般在24小时内派送。

sentences.en: He sent his letter by dispatch.
I was carrying dispatches from the ambassador.
I'll advise you of the dispatch of the goods.
sentences.cn: 我会通知你们货物的发运情况.

sentences.en: Nim Goldman had been conferring with somebody at the dispatch console.
sentences.cn: 尼姆?哥尔德曼一直在调度台上与别人商量.

sentences.en: Please hurry up the dispatch of these telegrams.
sentences.cn: 请赶快将这些电报发出去.

sentences.en: the dispatch of warships to the region
The maintenance supervisor would dispatch a crew to repair the damage.
sentences.cn: 维修管理人将派一组人去修理损坏的地方.

sentences.en: The three - man board manages its business with care and dispatch.
sentences.cn: 这个三人董事会办事细心、麻利.

sentences.en: The victory inspired him to dispatch a gleeful telegram to Roosevelt.
sentences.cn: 胜利促使他给罗斯福发了封喜报。

sentences.en: They're concerned with the dispatch and receipt of consignment.
sentences.cn: 和他们有关的是发货和接货.

sentences.en: We have 125 cases ready for dispatch.
We have to ask you to dispatch the consignment immediately.
sentences.cn: 我们得要求你立即发送该批货物。

sentences.en: We must ask someone to carry a dispatch from Rome to London.
sentences.cn: 我们得派人把急件由罗马送往伦敦.

sentences.en: We must ask you to dispatch the consignment immediately.
sentences.cn: 我们必须要求你立即发送该批货物.
